## Client.getPolicies() method

Fetch multiple policies by ID.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPolicies(request: GetPoliciesRequest, options?: RequestOptions): Promise<GetPoliciesResponse>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

request


</td><td>

</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

[RequestOptions](./core.requestoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[GetPoliciesResponse](./core.getpoliciesresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Remarks

Requires

- the client to be configured with [Options.adminCredentials](./core.options.admincredentials.md)<!-- -->, and

- the Cerbos policy decision point server to be configured with the [admin API](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/api/admin_api) enabled.

## Example


```typescript
const policies = await cerbos.getPolicies({
  ids: ["resource.document.v1", "resource.image.v1"],
});
```
